API Collection# Workflow and Control

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#topics)

### [Work Loops](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572161)

[`IOWorkLoop`](/documentation/kernel/ioworkloop)### [Timers](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572179)

[`IOTimerEventSource`](/documentation/kernel/iotimereventsource)Time based event source mechanism.[`IOWatchDogTimer`](/documentation/kernel/iowatchdogtimer)[`IOGetTime`](/documentation/kernel/1575332-iogettime)Deprecated[`IOTimeStampConstant`](/documentation/kernel/1535203-iotimestampconstant)[`IOTimeStampEndConstant`](/documentation/kernel/1535232-iotimestampendconstant)[`IOTimeStampStartConstant`](/documentation/kernel/1535234-iotimestampstartconstant)### [Sleep](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572183)

[`IODelay`](/documentation/kernel/1575328-iodelay)Spin delay for a number of microseconds.[`IOPause`](/documentation/kernel/1575333-iopause)Spin delay for a number of nanoseconds.[`IOSleep`](/documentation/kernel/1575320-iosleep)Sleep the calling thread for a number of milliseconds.[`IOSleepWithLeeway`](/documentation/kernel/1575303-iosleepwithleeway)### [Dispatch Queues](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572156)

[`IODispatchQueueInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iodispatchqueueinterface)[`IODispatchSourceInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iodispatchsourceinterface)[`IODispatchQueue`](/documentation/kernel/iodispatchqueue)### [Data Queues](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572169)

[`IODataQueueDispatchSource`](/documentation/kernel/iodataqueuedispatchsource)[`IODataQueueDispatchSourceInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iodataqueuedispatchsourceinterface)[`IODataQueue`](/documentation/kernel/iodataqueue)A generic queue designed to pass data from the kernel to a user process.### [Output Queues](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572165)

[`IOGatedOutputQueue`](/documentation/kernel/iogatedoutputqueue)An extension of an IOBasicOutputQueue.[`IOBasicOutputQueue`](/documentation/kernel/iobasicoutputqueue)A concrete implementation of an IOOutputQueue.[`IOOutputQueue`](/documentation/kernel/iooutputqueue)A packet queue that supports multiple producers and a single consumer.### [Notifications](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572174)

[`IOServiceNotificationDispatchSource`](/documentation/kernel/ioservicenotificationdispatchsource)[`IOServiceNotificationDispatchSourceInterface`](/documentation/kernel/ioservicenotificationdispatchsourceinterface)[`IONotifier`](/documentation/kernel/ionotifier)An abstract base class defining common methods for controlling a notification request.### [Interrupts](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572170)

[`IOInterruptDispatchSource`](/documentation/kernel/iointerruptdispatchsource)[`IOInterruptDispatchSourceInterface`](/documentation/kernel/iointerruptdispatchsourceinterface)[`IOFilterInterruptEventSource`](/documentation/kernel/iofilterinterrupteventsource)Filtering varient of the $link IOInterruptEventSource.[`IOInterruptEventSource`](/documentation/kernel/iointerrupteventsource)Event source for interrupt delivery to work-loop based drivers.[`IOInterruptController`](/documentation/kernel/iointerruptcontroller)[`PassthruInterruptController`](/documentation/kernel/passthruinterruptcontroller)[`IOInterruptSource`](/documentation/kernel/iointerruptsource)[`IOInterruptVector`](/documentation/kernel/iointerruptvector)### [Base Types](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#3572176)

[`IOCommandPool`](/documentation/kernel/iocommandpool)Manipulates a pool of commands which inherit from IOCommand.[`IOCommandGate`](/documentation/kernel/iocommandgate)Single-threaded work-loop client request mechanism.[`IOCommand`](/documentation/kernel/iocommand)This class is an abstract class which represents an I/O command.[`IODispatchSource`](/documentation/kernel/iodispatchsource)[`IOEventSource`](/documentation/kernel/ioeventsource)Abstract class for all work-loop event sources.## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals/workflow_and_control#see-also)
